name: Sirius Finance
description: "Cross-chain stablecoin AMM and Farming Center on Astar Network that attracts and locks tremendous value through stablecoins with low-slippage trading costs, attractive APY for liquidity providers on Astar Network, and allows for more financial innovations or yield enhancements for Astar users. Ultimately, it serves as a low-slippage swap protocol that connects Polkadot, EVM-compatible chains, other major layer1 chains and expanding use cases from stablecoins to other similarly valuable tokens. "
